Package com.jack.dicewars.dice_wars.setup

Created by Jack Mueller on 3/1/15.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    GameConfigActivity
    Allows the user to set the names, colors, and number of players, board size, and other options.
    HowToPlayActivity
    Displays a simple tutorial on how to play DiceWars to the user.
    ModeSelectActivity
    This activity allows the user to determine if they are playing with alone or with others.
    OptionsActivity
    This activity will allow the user to set default options that can be used across the app.
    SliderPagerFragment
    Holds an image that can be scrolled left or right off the screen.
    TitleActivity
    This activity is the entry point of the app.

Package com.jack.dicewars.dice_wars.setup Description

Created by Jack Mueller on 3/1/15. This package includes the Activities and related classes that are encountered before starting game play.
